name: @ondewo/ondewo-vtsi-client-js
description: ONDEWO Voip Telephone System Integration (VTSI) Client library for Js
author: ONDEWO GmbH

scripts.build: docker run -it -v ${PWD}:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/../api:/output-volume ondewo-js-proto-compiler ondewo-vtsi-api ondewo-vtsi-api ondewo
scripts.build-update: npm run build-only && npm run start-example
scripts.start-example: sudo cp lib/vtsi.js example/lib/vtsi.js && http-server example
scripts.build-sample: docker run -it -v ${PWD}/src:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/src/../api:/output-volume $npm_package_config_compiler vtsi ondewo-vtsi-api ondewo-vtsi-api ondewo
